subject: Rap Music
lead_paragraph: Lil’ Romeo, an actor and rapper whose full name is Percy Romeo Miller, signed a national letter of intent to attend Southern California yesterday. Miller is a senior guard at Beverly Hills (Calif.) High. His father, the hip-hop mogul Master P, had tryouts with two N.B.A. teams during the 1990s.
